Package lab3

Class RationalNumber

java.lang.Object
lab3.SpecialNumber
lab3.RationalNumber
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<RationalNumber>
public class RationalNumber extends lab3.SpecialNumber implements Comparable<RationalNumber>
A rational number is denoted by a numerator, and a denominator. The denominator should not be equal to zero.
